name: CyberCut AI
tagline: AI video studio for viral social clips
description: CyberCut AI helps creators and teams produce viral videos fast. Auto-slice long footage into social-ready clips, generate marketing videos, add high-precision subtitles, edit by text, access an AI asset library, try virtual model try-ons, and use a full AI toolkit.

name: Taskade Genesis
tagline: Build live apps with agents, memory and workflow automation.
description: Taskade Genesis one-shot builds live AI apps with memory, chat agents, and automated workflows. Projects remember, agents think and act, and automations handle real work. Build dashboards, CRMs, portals, and business systems that run themselves. Connect Stripe, Google, YouTube, Slack, and more than one hundred apps. One prompt gives you built-in chat, data, workflows, and integrations so your workspace grows with you. No code. No setup. Just creation. Your business, on autopilot.

name: TwelveLabs Marengo 3.0
tagline: The most powerful embedding model for video understanding
description: Marengo 3.0 is TwelveLabs' most significant model to date, delivering human-like video understanding at scale. A multimodal embedding model, Marengo fuses video, audio, and text for holistic video understanding to power precise video search and retrieval.

name: Cocoon by Telegram
tagline: Confidential compute open network
description: GPU owners mine TON by powering the network; App developers plug into low-cost AI compute; Users enjoy AI with full privacy and confidentiality; Telegram fuels demand and hype for Cocoon

name: Crow
tagline: Make your product AI-native via AI Copilot
description: After 100+ conversations with app builders, the same thing kept coming up: Everyone wants an AI copilot in their product. No one has time to wire it up. So we built Crow to add a chat-first copilot that can take real actions on any product within minutes.

name: The ∞ Bar
tagline: Group Chat with visionaries, innovators, and thought leaders
description: Let me be honest. We can already roleplay as famous personalities using ChatGPT or Gemini. That’s not new. What we’re doing differently with The Infinite Bar is context and experience. So it’s not “you talking to Steve Jobs.” It’s “you, Jobs, and Naval discussing what makes a great product.” These aren’t isolated characters. They have relationships, opinions, and chemistry between them..

name: NeuralAgent
tagline: Your AI Teammate that actually uses your computer.
description: NeuralAgent is your AI teammate that actually uses your computer, it moves your mouse, clicks, types, and automates real work across apps. This update introduces specialized agents, We started with NeuralCode, NeuralResearch, and NeuralGrowth based on the most popular use cases on NeuralAgent. We also evolved Background Mode for Windows and macOS which means you can continue using your computer while NeuralAgent is working.

name: Kodey.ai
tagline: Build real AI agents that work - not just chat.
description: Kodey makes creation effortless. Describe what you want, and the agent begins to form. Behavior shaped by your words. Data and tools woven together in motion. Tasks run while you rest. Prompt. Test. Deploy. Each rhythm builds momentum - like hiring a digital teammate who never slows down. Your business begins to breathe on its own.

name: Contenov
tagline: AI tool turning any topic into an SEO blog brief in minutes
description: Contenov scrapes the top 10 Google results for your keywords, analyzes the 5 most relevant pages, and creates a complete, data-driven SEO blog brief in minutes generated by AI. It analyzes headings, structure, keyword ideas, and key insights from real competitor content - giving you a clear, optimized outline ready for writers. Stop manually researching topics and create high-quality content briefs effortlessly!

name: FlowLens
tagline: Bug reports built for coding agents, so you can ship faster.
description: FlowLens makes sharing web-app bugs with your coding agents ridiculously easy. No more praying your agent can reproduce an issue, or dumping console logs and screenshots into chat. Just click once in the Chrome extension and FlowLens captures everything automatically. Your coding agent gets rich, ready-to-use context through the open-source MCP server. All while keeping token usage super efficient.

name: Rephrase
tagline: Fix grammar and format text instantly on Mac
description: Stop context-switching to ChatGPT. Rephrase is a native macOS utility that fixes grammar, translates languages, and polishes your tone in any application (Slack, Xcode, Mail, Notes). Just select text and press Cmd + to transform it instantly. Built native for zero latency. No monthly fees—pay once, use forever.

name: AppForceStudio
tagline: Design, Code & Launch Apps
description: AppForceStudio lets anyone design, code, and publish real apps in minutes. Whether you’re a solo founder, designer, or developer, our studio helps you go from idea to App Store — instantly. Build for React Native, iOS or Android, or web without heavy coding.

name: Zena by ZenABM - LinkedIn Ads AI Analyst
tagline: Analyze your LinkedIn Ads + revenue impact on company level!
description: Meet Zena - ZenABM's LinkedIn Ads AI analyst! Zena (by ZenABM.com) is an AI chatbot analyzing LinkedIn Ads performance on company level. It lets you ask your LinkedIn API CRM data any questions about your top-performing ads, campaigns, most engaged companies, job titles and ad-influenced deals. You can use it produce detailed reports by combining data from LinkedIn ads API with data from your CRM in minutes - all by simply chatting to Zena.

name: Patenty.ai
tagline: AI-powered patent drafting that speaks your language
description: Patent attorneys spend up to 70% of their time on repetitive documentation. Patenty.ai changes that. Unlike generic AI or US-focused tools, we're built for real patent workflows with native Asian language support (KR, JP, CN) and global coverage (US, EP). Key features: AI-assisted drafting, prior art search with similarity analysis, automated OA analysis and response drafting, custom style learning for your firm and clients, and real-time collaboration. Human-in-the-loop — always.

name: Buck
tagline: #1 Prediction Market Game
description: A Fair and Transparent Prediction Game: A 60-second, oracle-driven ladder game where users predict asset price movements for multipliers up to 20x, paid in SOL and the native $BUCK token.

name: PromptPerf 2.0
tagline: Find which AI wins for YOUR prompts. Test 100+ models free.
description: The Problem: You're using ChatGPT because everyone does. But is it actually the best AI for YOUR specific task? Maybe Claude writes better code. Maybe Llama is 10x cheaper and just as good. The Solution: PromptPerf lets you test your actual prompts across 100+ AI models simultaneously and shows you which one wins. ✨ What's New in 2.0: • 100+ models • Speed benchmarks • Ready-to-use templates • Save tests and re-run when models update

name: SnapPay
tagline: Ship payments in minutes.
description: SnapPay is a Stripe-plus billing SDK for founders who want payments without webhooks. Create a checkout in 1 line, get clean SSE events instead of dozens of webhooks, and track credits, seats, or feature access out of the box. Ship Stripe-powered payments in minutes, not weeks.

name: Adgena
tagline: Turn any product URL into a video ad in 60 seconds
description: Stop paying $500-5,000 for UGC creators. Stop waiting 2 weeks for delivery. Adgena turns any product URL into a professional video ad in under 2 minutes: → Paste your Amazon, Shopify, Etsy, or TikTok Shop link → AI scrapes product details & generates a UGC-style script → Pick from 24 AI avatars with different accents → Get a 12-second HD video with voiceover $2-4 per video. No filming, no actors, no editing. Launch special: 3 free videos, no credit card required.

name: Shuppi
tagline: Your friendly global digital marketplace
description: Join Shuppi — the global marketplace where creators sell, buyers discover, and help you grow.

name: AI Lab
tagline: Build intelligent applications
description: The next generation AI workspace for building intelligent applications. Create, collaborate, and innovate with cutting-edge AI tools. Currently the tool is in BETA stage.
